title: Material
description: A material on a Mesh node.

properties.name: textureX
properties.description: The offset of the texture on the x axis. Useful for UV scrolling.

properties.name: textureY
properties.description: The offset of the texture on the y axis. Useful for UV scrolling.

properties.name: emissiveIntensity
properties.description: The emissive intensity of the material. Values greater than 1 will activate HDR Bloom, as long as the emissive is not black.
